website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung HU8550 series of LED televisions is packed with features and despite some picture issues, it performs the best of the 4K panels we've tested. 1080p is still a better bet right now, but If you're set on a 4K TV, it should be at the top of your list.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible picture and smart features.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing. The picture is incredible, the smart features are even more incredible. The smart remote make using the cursor a breeze. I added a USB keyboard which makes it even nicer. Don't need my ROKU any longer due to the wide selection of apps. The web browser is just a little slow on a hardwired connection, but very acceptable. I haven't tried the 3D yet, but the 4k pictures are just ridiculously beautiful. Even 'regular' HD is MUCH better than my old Panasonic plasma. Setup was a breeze and it communicates with my Denon AVR so switching between sources, volume, and on/off are all taken care of on both with the Samsung remote.
customer_reviews.author: KalaK

customer_reviews.title: Advertise as 65" Samsung TV 4K ULTRA HD
customer_reviews.text: After connecting the Samsung TV and Samsung 4K DVD, I got a message "HDMI IS NOT COMPARABLE needs "HD_CP 2.2" which the TV doest NOT have. After complaining to Samsung and Amazon they said nothing the can do. The description and the box says it is a 4K-ULTRA HD TV. The description says 4K ULTRA-HD BUT THE TV IS NOT 4K. STAY AWAY FROM SAMSUNG PRODUCTS THEY DO NOT GIVE YOU WHAT YOU PAYING FOR. Do not get stuck paying a lot of money, LIKE I DID, and not get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Picture.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good value for the money - I see big vertical lines in the screen even on 4k content. It honestly looks like 4 smaller screens where sorta welded together and I'm looking at the seams in between the panels. Sound is weak. Doesn't look like 4K. Bought this because it was highly rated by Consumer Reports, but honestly feel kinda ripped off. I've sen much nicer TV's by SHARP for far less, and SONY for only slightly more.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesomest TV!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pictures, super clarity makes it almost unreal. The smart-hub is much better designed now. I miss the VGA port though in this model. The screen mirroring is simple and easy to use. However I find that the connection is not reliable and keeps breaking up for no reason - but its easy to recover.
customer_reviews.author: Kosigi

customer_reviews.title: It is all about the customer service
customer_reviews.text: To be fair. It is a nice TV when watching 4k contents. The upscale isn't really upscaling. My issue is not the TV itself. It's Samsung customer service/Smart Hub and how horrible they are. If I'm spending a good chunk of my money on a high ticket item, I expect fast response. It took Samsung 24 - 48 hours to call me and often times when I'm not home. I always believe that customer service is as important as the product the company sells. Which is why I'm going for LG 65UF8500 once the return is completed.
customer_reviews.author: Sinjil

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture. Have had this for about a week and am very happy. I also got the Samsung 4k Video pack. The 4K videos are so clear you feel you could reach through the screen and touch something. I have Dish satellite and the Dish HD content looks very good. So far the only issue, and its a very slight issue, is the 3D. There is a little ghosting. I have the Imax under the sea Blue ray disk. Mostly the 3D is very good but there are a few spots where you see a slight ghosting effect. Its only been a week but so far I am very happy with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: RonM3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound for the price. Tried allot of recommended settings, but reverted back to mostly defaults. it seemed they worked best on most movies. Samsung must be fine tuning while in production. (what you had to do a month ago, isn't necessarily needed now). Watch "Journey To The Center Of The Earth" w/Brendon Fraser. Great 3D.. Only downside is screen glare, this puppy will reflect almost any perpendicular light source.
customer_reviews.author: wbent44

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, I have it fully calibrated with CAL ...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, I have it fully calibrated with CAL Man and did a full 10 point calibration. Compared to the 7K series it appears that the 8 has the 10 point adjustment. I know you're not supposed to iuse the enhanced black setting but it looks really washed out without it. Overall I like it, but it's still not OLED and there is a little bleed in the corners. 4K streaming looks the same as Bluray and is pretty much worthless. I'm glad I bought it, but I won't buy again until OLED is perfected and they fix the aging problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: TV is 4 years and 2 months old, received the blue screen of death today....... almost a 5K dollar TV, she be better than this from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W

customer_reviews.title: Another great Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV with the apps and absolutely stunning. picture and watching in ultra HD programming on Netflix is incredible. I have a lot of samsung LED TV so I am very familiar and I only buy Samsung TV. It's an absolutely great TV except for the speakers are not loud so likely need a surround sound system
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: ... months and finally made the plunge and at a great price. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted this TV for months and finally made the plunge and at a great price. I love it. Love it! Falcon posted a review on 4/22/14 which was a guide on how to accurately set up this TV to get the best quality. I followed the suggestions. Noticed the difference right away and very pleased with the results. Awesome TV that I'm still learning about.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scheidt

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but calibrate it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! But don't watch it a day without making the necessary calibrations and adjustments. They make that big of a difference. (Settings for this model are all over the Internet.) Buy a good separate speaker system (we bought the Vbox Soundbase 570) and you will wonder how you could ever have lived without this television. We found ourselves re-watching many of our favorite films because the experience is now so vastly superior.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Eye popping video
customer_reviews.text: This us an awesome monitor. The high quality of the video is outstanding. Cannot wait for true 4k video. Only drawback after getting ARC enabled HDMI 2.0 cable and upgrading my av receiver to Pioneer elite vsx 90 and following instructions for both units still unable to get ARC to work. This is the reason I did not gI've a rating of 5 stars. You cannot go wrong with Samsung this is my 5th tv from them and all the others are still working. Would strongly recommend this to others
customer_reviews.author: Anandale

customer_reviews.title: Samsung best overall
customer_reviews.text: We looked at just about all new TVs available. We decided that the Samsung 4k HD 3d gave the very best picture for overall viewing and functions. Apparently, there are two different 3d Technologies. The Samsung 3d offers more depth while the LG type of 3d gives more popping out effects. We decided that the everyday picture quality was more important. The Samsung met our every expectation and is a wonderful viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: still great
customer_reviews.text: never stopped working, I wish Samsung could have upgraded the software and have wireless option to network, but meh! still great TV
customer_reviews.author: hefemi

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and fun learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a wireless Samsung BD DVD player prior to this purchase so my learning curve for using the TV's regular remote was rather easy. I haven't hooked up the wave your hand, talk to the TV remote yet. Yes it has 2 remotes. My wireless apps work fine and I haven't surfed the internet with it yet or hooked up the keyboard with pad or used the 3D function but if I have any problems I'll let you know later.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 23 months.
customer_reviews.text: I would be sure to plan to buy the extended warranty if you buy this TV. 23 Months after we bought it a bunch of vertical lines appeared overnight. Samsung directed us to authorized service - which gave us an estimate to repair of $1400. Neither Samsung nor Amazon was willing to provide any relief.
customer_reviews.author: John P Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Its OK but...
customer_reviews.text: Its OK but hard to tell the difference between regular HD and 4K Ultra HD. Also, setting up the remote control is not for amateurs. I still havn't cleared all the buttons, and don't know if I ever will. There seem to be too many items on remote control. Every time I turn it on, something new pops up. Where will it all end?
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Goudeau

customer_reviews.title: ARC HOOK -UP DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I own 7 SAMSUNG SMART TV'S this is the first one I ever had a problem with AND THE MOST EXPENSIVE ONE I have purchased. The ARC hook up is not working correctly. I have connected two different types of receivers to this TV. My next choice is to ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: As long as you follow the picture adjustment tips in these reviews, it is the most beautiful picture for the money. Easily the best picture I have ever seen in my life watching Breaking Bad in 4K. I do kind of wish I had oredered the 65" now.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B Trunnell

customer_reviews.title: Great Display, Slow SmartHub OS....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Display.... Colors are vivid & Motion Blur is minimal.... Only in certain scenarios you might feel the motion blur..... The Samsung Smart Hub seemed little slow and lagging. I believe you need to update the One Connect to get the performance on OS. But if you ignore the slow OS, The display is AMAZING.....
customer_reviews.author: vikhyat verma

customer_reviews.title: Incredible TV and shipping
customer_reviews.text: HD movies are upscaled and it appears that you are watching scenes through a window, as opposed to on a TV. I've been watching a 50" plasma, and have no regrets as this set has an incredible image, user friendly apps, one remote controls the TV and the Cable box. The shipping team was very responsive and I was able to pick up the TV at the local freight forwarder and get it a week earlier than I would have had I waited on having it delivered, with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: John C.S. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture; excellent set-up
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Probably lots more then I'll ever use. Difficult to evaluate UHD, there's so little available. Picture is great, but so is a comparable non UHD Samaung. Delivery was good, help to set-up was outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: James E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good price, free shipping very clear picture. Only con is sound. You will need more speakers and a subwoofer (which I have) to really enjoy. The speakers in these ultra flat screens can't be bigger than a quarter so what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Very great 4k TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV very sharp picture deep color.I just love this TV and got a good deal on AMZ. Regarding the shipping it took so long to arrived due to the weather.Anyway i love it and still enjoy this tv in our family room!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Even HD looks much better!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! The sound and picture is beyond imagination. It up-scales everything as close to 4K resolution as possible, so even HD looks much better! The professional setup settings can be found on line.
customer_reviews.author: Bri P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Truly stunning display when watching something in 4k, there is an immediate difference between 4k and HD.
customer_reviews.author: Greg White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. The guys who delivered it did a nice job setting it up. No issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture. I initially experienced a severe judder effect ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. I initially experienced a severe judder effect when watching sports. However, I discovered the cause was not the television, but was a setting in my stereo receiver in which I had my cable box and OPPO running through. Once I changed the resolution setting in the receiver, the judder effect went away.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Although expensive it is a quality product at a reasonable price for the capabilities you get. Recommend product and seller if you are willing to bite the price bullet for 4K Ultra HD.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny the GRATEFUL

customer_reviews.title: awesome picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is the best I've ever owned and amazon delivered the TV and set it all up very good service from them. All in all I love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV. Great colors and even deeper blacks
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV. Great colors and even deeper blacks. Refresh fast enough for even the most active sports. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, picture is amazing although it takes some time figuring out everything.
customer_reviews.author: rhoot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV at a SUPER sale price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV at a SUPER sale price. Sound is lacking but that is to be expected these days so just add a soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Halliburton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tv
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tv. I have directv (1080i) and the picture is awesome but, this tv really shines when you put in a blu ray. Get some surround sound and its better than being at the movie theaters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst mistake ever!! Do not order from OneCall!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute disaster. Received this TV & it has no sound. I can look at my $3,000 TV but cannot hear it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and great and fast service from the company. Thank you very much. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Barszcz

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV! Works perfectly for us. The 3-D feature works fine with 3-D DVDs and can't wait to try with streaming video. I have no complaints about this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vagabonds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV.. I love everything about it. Super clear.. I can't wait for 4k content to be available. I got the 75" from big box superstore and it was delivered in under a week...thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: M. rock

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic tv way beyond expectations. was a open box so saved a bunch on purchase. The picture is so clear you get submersed in the picture and it make you feel that you are part of the crew filming the show. Only drawback and it is not that big a deal is the sound. I am buying a sound bar and subwooffer. Thanks Rex CFuller
customer_reviews.author: Rex C. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves this. Its a replacement for his old TV. Works as expected. Dad is the tech guy, Skype with it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Agbonta felix

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: the tv right out of the box worked really well, played Avatar and Jurassic Park 3d movies, I was impressed. I was thinking of the "curved" samsungs but after reading reviews I decided to buy the top of the line flat screen for the same money that the entry level curved screen cost. I am very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: toothdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Picture is great. Sound is great. From time to time there is a moment when sound - a syllable - is skipped. I'm blaming that on the lower feed quality than on the TV. (Although I could be mistaken.) I've watched a couple of movies in 3D and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TV... Seriously... LOVE IT. You will however need a separate sound system...
customer_reviews.author: Emma Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Clarity and upscaling
customer_reviews.text: I had a HD TV Samsung before and The videos on this 4k TV are simply breathtaking and the 1080p to 4k up conversion is pretty good too. Loved the clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: i did a six month researce on TV's. Brand, size, features and prices. I am completely satisfied with my purchase from Amazon. My wife and I enjoy sports on TV. Best Super Bowl game of all, and I've seen them all. I was really excited to recieve my Samsung 65" TV before the big game. THANKS SO MUCH: JIMMY @ Silsbee, TX
customer_reviews.author: James Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV.....prices retreat so quickly. It's almost outdated before it arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Blaettler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big purchase for us and we are very happy with it. We have always liked Samsung TV's and this one is no different. Until more shows are broadcast in 4K, it's capabilities are underused though. The delivery and set up that came with the TV is what makes it stand out. Amazon had it shipped to the house with two very knowledgeable young men. They carried it in, set it up, showed us how it worked, and then cleaned everything up afterward. Great job guys!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great on the up-converted 1080p signal and even better on ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great on the up-converted 1080p signal and even better on the netflix 4k content (only wish there was more of it). Along with a very low profile mount, this TV also sits very close to the wall... which was one of the concessions for my wife, and the reason i didn't want a curved screen.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Frischhertz

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't like my HD tv's anymore
customer_reviews.text: Most incredible tv I ever had, picture is out of this world after setting and adjusting the picture. Now I don't like my HD tv's anymore. Samsung is great.
customer_reviews.author: dieter h. benesch

customer_reviews.title: You will love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: The finest TV we have owned. Extraordinary picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Problem Free - Best Picture Quality Ever
customer_reviews.text: Problem free. Received on schedule. Mounted and worked right out of the box. Best picture quality I've ever seen and I have usually purchased the latest models over the years. SMART software also working as advertised. Nothing bad to report.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Got the volume problem solved! Forgot to ask Tech ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the volume problem solved! Forgot to ask Tech re: Voice requests which need strong altering to be effective HELP!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Norman L Ellenberg

customer_reviews.title: this is a t_v is amazing! Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: this is a t_v is amazing! Very easy to setup.it took a little time to figure out how to get everything hooked up to my home theater system and ps4 and my xbox, but once it was all hooked up everything looks in sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV - very veryhappy with it, so clear it's like looking though a window!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG yes most amazing and has exceeded my expectations and for the price its unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice. Wall mounted
customer_reviews.text: My 4th Samsung LED TV. Looks very nice. Wall mounted. Impresses everybody who sees the picture. I like the cursor on the screen and use it to select options but the remote is a bit finicky. Smart hub has improved vastly since my 2012 Samsung smart tv ((7000 series?). Limited 4k sources so cannot exploit the full gamut of capabilities. It is mounted in kitchen/eating space so it does not sound great. I may need to invest in some extra speakers.
customer_reviews.author: FauxMite

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed to be honest. The amount of clouding and vertical banding is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: kl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV -- but needs some adjustment out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV -- but needs some adjustment out of the box. Picture quality id fantastic for 4K content as well as up-scaled HD content
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing experience with SAMSUNG
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing experience with Samsung Customer Service. It took 8 weeks to get service done after I received a damaged motherboard which came with the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great TV! Color is amazing ease of use is great and it can automatically download updates to the TV. I wish the manuals were better in explaining the options of hooking up other devices. Recommend that you get Samsungs Sound stand with the TV for better TV sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brian

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another Samsung product. Barely 1 year old and they did an automatic software update, now my TV recycles the power every 30 seconds. Can't access anything before it powers down and recycles again. Endless update loop. The only way to get it fixed is to pay $550 to ship it back to Samsung for repair. Not gonna happen. In the dumpster it goes. Samsung has permanently lost a customer on this one. Complete waste of $2500.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV, great purchase so far. Great picture for 4k netflix of course and 1080p is good also. I am not a videophile by any means, so I don't consider this a professional review. However, for the average viewer I don't see how you could be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lamergamer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE OUR NEW SAMSUNG !!
customer_reviews.text: A truly amazing TV. It beats our greatest expectations! We had a 32 " TV before this, but this literally takes your breath away! It took us a while to set it up & to read all the instructions, but we're really getting the hang of it now & it defies our wildest dreams!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen L. Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Appears to have it all over the other TV's
customer_reviews.author: David Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, picture is outstanding after tweaking.
customer_reviews.text: just received TV yesterday, very easy setup. Just needed to tweak the picture settings to make it great! The picture is outstanding after setting it up. I thought I would need a sound bar, but the sound is pretty good for a flat screen. I am very happy with the features and extras so far. The only gripe I have is the cost. It is an expensive TV. I guess the old saying "you get what you pay for" applies. If it was less expensive, I would have given it 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and light. It was easy to set up and the picture is the best you can buy on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo N Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, great picture
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, great picture. But I can't get it to stop juddering randomly. Contacted Samsung and made their adjustments keeps coming back. This is not hassle free TV watching. Looking into a return, don't want to have to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: GRD

customer_reviews.title: Was good, but now have audio issues, after 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: After owning 3 years, beginning to sour. Audio inputs via HDMI starts to go mute. Can fix by turning TV off, pushing power button 10 seconds, turn back on. Have to do this now a few times per week. May buy a Sony next time.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: A nice TV, great display and a lot of features ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice TV, great display and a lot of features when using the internet. The sharpness of the 4x screen alone makes the price worthwhile. The two remotes are a nice addition (one operates very much like a mouse.) I initially had some problems with the delivery system (no fault of Amazon), but I got everything straightened out. The first Samsung had a hairline crack across the screen, Amazon replaced it quickly with no problems. Would I purchase this item again? Yep, in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymis

customer_reviews.title: Grate  tv.  Worth buying it.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tv.the best I have ever bought. Picture quality and user friendly are undeniable. Don't hesitate to buy. I would highly recommend this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Just WOW! Great connectivity. Superslim depth. Almost edge to edge 4k love. All positive from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: The picture is beautiful, but the apps are bad
customer_reviews.text: The picture is beautiful, but the apps are bad, the UI is bad, and there are missing features. I got this primarily for movies and gaming. Turns out that the amazon instant video and netflix apps both have terrible sync between the audio and the video, so you see characters speak before you hear it, or vice versa. And the "game mode" can't be used when using 4k resolution.
customer_reviews.author: imh

customer_reviews.title: TV is great. Delivered on time and couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: TV is great. Delivered on time and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: picture needs a little color calibration. other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love this TV. It's big, the resolution is amazing and the colors are awesome. I have been watching some of the early Pixar movies (Toy Story, A Bugs Life, Monsters Inc, etc) via my Apple TV. This TV up converts them so well you'd swear they were 4k movies. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: WackyBrakke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best TV I have ever purchased. The details in the picture is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Robin White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture, sleek form factor.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this TV is amazing. Form factor is also very modern and sleek. Has the option of normal candybar remote or smaller voice activated remote which paired with the IR blaster can control your cable/satellite box as well. Initially had a problem with the Netflix app not working, but after software update started working again. Easily paired this with the home theater in a box 3d blu ray system from Samsung and the 3D works surprisingly well. Cons: The batteries in the 3d glasses deplete very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Koboldt

customer_reviews.title: and love it, great picture
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before buying this, and love it , great picture, sound , plus save over $500 on cost with no major differences.
customer_reviews.author: seal70

customer_reviews.title: Viewing this TV is like no other
customer_reviews.text: Viewing this TV is like no other. Family and friends envy it and wish they could have it. I bought it just in time for football season, looks unbelievable!! Blurays are to die for with ridiculously unbelievably clarity. One cousin said, "Its not a TV, its an experience (similar to IMAX)." Samsung got it right this time!!
customer_reviews.author: Codejudeg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I absolutely love this TV. Amazing picture, easy to setup and integrate with the rest of a home theater system! A bit pricey but for me, worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: James E Bagby

customer_reviews.title: Looking for advice
customer_reviews.text: I have the TV installed but I have a concern. Frequently the picture has a slight jitter to it that lasts maybe 2 seconds. Also the words are often not in sink with the picture. Is this to be expected or do I have a problem TV?
customer_reviews.author: R. Bern

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My first HD television, but genuinely outperformed my expectations. Will update in 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: SDMX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tv I have ever owned . Highly recommend to any one who likes 3d and wants 4k quality
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Just as it is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture. Lots of adjustments will let you make the picture just the way you like it. Easy and intuitive setup.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Tv is great. still figuring it out. Have not done 3D yet, didn't buy it for that. Was used and was missing a remote but Amazon's helping me make it right.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICTURE,,
customer_reviews.text: you won't be disappointed, the picture is great, it seems to get smarter the longer you have it. learns what you want. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality! Super crystal clear. Over the air and internet access is sharp, with no sound delay. 4K is awesome and am looking forward to new movies and shows in this format!
customer_reviews.author: Myreview2

customer_reviews.title: awesome UHD TV
customer_reviews.text: great picture...remember to take off the clear wrapping and do not block remote sensor bottom right..otherwise remote will not work.
customer_reviews.author: a frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV! The picture is so beautiful and the instructions are quite clear. We feel like the characters are in the room with us.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is good if you turn off all of the terrible settings ...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a decent television if it didn't reboot randomly multiple times a day. The picture quality is good if you turn off all of the terrible settings that Samsung automatically has enabled. The smart TV interface and software is awkward. My issue is that the TV will randomly turn off and on while being viewed. Samsung support is truly horrific and unable to deal with something that appears to only affect a small number of customers. For this reason, I will not be buying Samsung TV's in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Levine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Great pictures. Reliable. I have had it for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: McGuyver

customer_reviews.title: Works like modern TV should
customer_reviews.text: The picture is superb and the built in apps such as netflix, plex, and amazon made this TV instantly useful with only a single cord to the TV (power). Samsung has really done things right with their newer GUI, passing (even) the dreaded "spouse test".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was pissed when I got my 1099. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pissed when I got my 1099. It took six months for the TV and dish network to be compatible with each other for the first six months that picture didn't match The volume and there were blurs after spending hours hours and hrs. And months on the phone with dish it finally started working right
customer_reviews.author: gregory sarver

customer_reviews.title: 4K TV is beyond belief - Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tv, just blows you away how light, thin the unit is yet the picture is beyond belief. Love the 2nd easy remote. Very easy to set up & connect to all the online services.
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, problem with sound
customer_reviews.text: Great picture (better than any other set that I've seen). TV set sound was good first day, but got distorted on the day two. It now sounds like a laptop. Multiple phone calls to Samsung support and two visits from field technicians later the issue is still not resolved.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a month and I have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for about a month and I have been very happy with it. The picture is outstanding and now I am just waiting for more 4K content to be available. My Bluray discs really look great on this TV. The enhanced delivery went very well too.
customer_reviews.author: denver don

customer_reviews.title: Super TV
customer_reviews.text: Best TV we own and have ever bought. Delivered on time and set up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dogcat

customer_reviews.title: 4K contents will make you cry...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous picture quality, after some adjustments, basically movie mode with color boost. There are other reviews woth adjustment recommendations and they are good place to start. The Netflix 4K video on Deserts is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galon

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it was written up to be. After a month I'm still finding features.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G
